name: Skyfish Odyssey
description:
Take control of a community of migratory fish as they fly back to the sea.

Use the mouse to steer their flight path and meet new friends along the way!

Skyfish Odyssey takes about 5 minutes to play from start to finish. Enjoy the ride!

Made for the 2020 GDEX Game Jam. Ended up rushing the ending and the graphics a bit, but I'm relatively happy with the flying mechanism.
